snippet.title: Perennial Order | Release Date - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Perennial Order® is scheduled to launch digitally on September 6, 2024, for Steam, Epic Games Store, Xbox Series X|S, and PlayStation®5, priced at $19.99.  

Dive into the world of Perennial Order®, an upcoming 2D plant horror boss rush from SOEDESCO® and Gardenfiend Games®. Face nature's darkest terrors alone or with a companion across all supported platforms. Explore treacherous environments, test your skills, and battle formidable bosses in a quest to uncover the source of all this chaos.

Follow SOEDESCO®!
Discord: https://discord.gg/soedesco
Website: http://www.soedesco.com/
Newsletter: https://bit.ly/2wsfR4f
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Soedesco
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soedesco
Instagram: https://instagram.com/soedesco

Video editors: 
@DanielFigaresYT 
@juanfranrivero

About SOEDESCO:
SOEDESCO is an independent video game developer, publisher, and distributor founded in 2002 by Soedesh Chauthi with its headquarters in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, and offices in Madrid, Spain & Pilsen, Czech Republic. We deliver creative content across multiple genres and platforms for a worldwide audience in physical and digital formats.
